structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - STREET USE AND CLEANLINESS

text.section: It shall be unlawful for any person to haul or cause to be hauled over the streets of the City any dirt, shingles, laths, or trash in a wagon or other vehicle, unless the wagon or vehicle is constructed to prevent, and does prevent, the spilling of dirt, shingles, laths or trash upon the streets.

It shall be unlawful for any person to permit a truck or other vehicle under his control to track mud, in appreciable quantity, on the streets or sidewalks of the City. (Code 1959 , ยง19-11; Ord. No. 1978-700, ยง1, 1-7-78)
